atlantic.title: 7 Truly Amazing Reasons to Care About NASA's New Satellite
atlantic.topComment: Yet another story about the GOP sabotaging the country they pretend to serve. Thank you for shedding some light on this one. How those guys find voters is beyond me.

atlantic.title: Democracy, Deferred
atlantic.topComment: Location, oil, tribes, religions, wealth, environment, demographics, and politics, Nigeria might be the most interesting country in the world. There are a lot of moving parts. Hopefully, a popular elected leader is put in charge who can meet the chal...
